name: Broken Dreams (itch) (Poseudon)
description:
In this game you have to get little Dream-Susi back into her bed. The Problem is that Susis Dream-World is broken apart so you have to get through little Riddles and Jump´n Runs to fix her room and get into the bed.

Credits:

  • Steffen Rohe
  • Jonas Maier
  • Julius Winkeler
  • Johannes Holzapfel
  • Peter Burkhardt
